title: I am locked out of my account, I cannot sign in.

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have entered my password incorrectly too many times
  • My Unity account is locked.

sections.title: Cause
content: Our system will temporarily lock your account if there is an excessive number of unsuccessful sign in attempts.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Your account can be locked for up to 2 hours if the password is entered incorrectly too many times. If you need to gain access to your account sooner than this, please contact us with the following information:

• E-mail address attached to your account
  • Account Username

sections.title: More Information
content: For information on general website failures, please see this article.
Please see Unity Accounts Terms of Service here
Please see Unity Accounts Privacy Policy here
